choices: Natasha and Wanda are calling Toni for a hangout
121321.content:
"Oh my god!" shouted Toni Stark at her brand new lab "It is almost perfect. I mean, it is like everything I really wished" she said to her lab mates inspecting the brand new high tech laboratory and checking the brand new machinery.

"I hope everything is like you want" said a short slim girl with a sidebob hairdo. "we got everything we could from the celestial secret place" said the scientist girl mentioning the gigantic humanoid bodies surrounded by gigantic armors laid at several places over the world and source for several technological marvels, including the birthing centers, place where the girls all around the world can go, blend their DNA and in 9 months get their daughters.

"I see" said Toni still inspecting the machinery "We made the last raid at the Apalache's Celestial den. If we get too much from there other companies will start to search from where we got our toys and they will start to plunder that place"

"Like we did" said the scientist girl

"That is a little detail which we are never going to gossip about right?"

"What are you talking about Toni?" said Pepper coming to the lab

"Oh, nothing Pepper" said Toni to the red haired girl dressing a nice white sleeveless short dress and a matching pair of sandal. "We were talking about this new lab"

"The Iron Girl lab" said Pepper "Well, we spent a lot to build ths lab for you as your second 13rd anniversary. I hope this time you don't forget to build my armor, because it is not fair you left your BFF out of the Avengers club"

"I will think about it." said Toni checking her phone and reading a message
121321.title: Antonia "Toni" Stark/Iron Woman

1213322.content: What if Loki finds a way to send members of the avengers to an alternate world?
1213322.title: Keeping it simple

12133221.content:
Steve Rogers was sitting at a Wakandan café enjoying some of the local delicacies when he heard a voice behind him ask "Enjoying the retired life?" He didn't even have to turn around to know who was talking. He had spent enough time around the god of mischief to know his voice.

"I'm not retired" Steve replied, still not turning around.

"Really? You are what, 100 years old? I'd say you've earned a nice retirement by now" Loki said as he took a seat at the outdoor table, clearly trying to get under Steve's skin.

"I'm 99. And what are you doing here Loki? I woulda figured your brother had you buried in a dark whole in some far off corner of the galaxy"

"Oh, believe me he and my father wanted to. But mother, she wanted me a little closer to home"

"What are you doing here?"

"Well, I just had to see it for myself. Word has spread throughout the galaxy that the might avengers of earth have split up. Truthfully I just had to see it for myself"

"Let me guess, you wanted to be the one to defeat earths mightiest hero's" Steve said sarcastically.

"I'll admit, after Thor locked me up in Asgard's dungeon I did begin plotting your teams demise. And the thought of breaking you all by breaking you apart did occur to me, but I didn't think it would work"

"Well it did. So, what's you evil plan today?"

"Well" Loki started. "I figured I'd try and, as you humans say, kick the dog while it's down"

"Oh really"

"Really. You see, in my traveling of the galaxy I've come across many unique devices" Loki said smugly as he pulled something out of his jacket. "This one here can send a person to an entire different earth. An, alternate reality if you may. Some with minor differences that may or may not have an effect on the grand scheme of things, others where major events are changed and the world is vastly different"

"So why don't you go try your luck with one of those, other earths"

I thought about it, teaming up with myself and taking over a different earth. But then I decided, why not just scatter earths mightiest hero's and take over while they're absent"

Steve was about to say something when Loki activated the device he had in his hand. It began making noises before it suddenly shot out a beam hitting Steve square in the chest. The beam knocked Steve out of the chair and back several feet before he blacked out.

Where did Loki send Captain Steve Rogers?
12133221.title: Go for it

13533221222111212211.content:
while Cat was sitting at the kitchen table Jade was hard at work fixing the two of them dinner. once the food was ready, Jade placed two plates of Chicken with potatoes down for them to eat. Jade then got a glass of Kool-Aid for Cat and herself a diet soda for them to drink.

Cat looked down at her meal for a minute enjoying how good it smelled, Cat hadn't had much more than a small baggie of corn nuts for dinner since she had started living in Hollywood arts small attic.

Cat(smiling): "thanks mom."

that caught Jade by surprise for a short moment, she hadn't expected Cat to call her "mom" so soon after she and Beck basically adopted her, then thought maybe Cat had called her that to get used to the idea.

Jade: "you're welcome Kitten."

after they finished eating and put the dish's in the sink they decided to turn in for the night and got dressed in their pajamas. Jade then took Jade to the guest room that was now Cat's new bedroom and tucked Cat in, kissing the red haired girl on the forehead and saying good night before heading to her own room for the night and just barely hearing Cat mutter "love you" as she left the room.

144112.content:
Stretching in his bed, Ben's ears twitched, listening for the telltale sound of Gwen or Kevin cooking breakfast, his tail wagged as he sat up. He liked it when they cooked breakfast, they were smart enough to not burn themselves or eat the wrappers. Hopping out of his bed, he did a few more stretches when he definitely heard them cooking downstairs.

Tail wagging, Ben dropped to all fours and ran at full tilt down the corridor, "Food! Food! Food!" He tackled Gwen just as she finished setting out the plates. "Morning!" He greeted her between licks to the face.

"Ack! Ben!" Gwen complained, her own tail wagging, but her behavior much more sedate due to the Anodite part of her. "Down!" As Ben got off her, she groaned, looking at the ceiling, "And you forgot clothes, again."

Looking down at his naked self, Ben just shrugged, and looked at her, splaying his ears back for maximum effect, "Food?"

Gwen nodded, pointing at the table, "Take a seat."

And as Ben sat down at the table for his food, who joined them?
144112.title: Dog ears, tail, bahavior, etc.

1442.content:
Ben yawned as he woke up, he stretch as he got out of bed. He went to his bathroom, he removed his green negligee. Then he took a shower, once done and finish with the rest of his morning routine.

Ben went to get dress, first he put on a pair of green panties and matching corset. Then he slid on a pair of black thigh high stockings.

Then he put on a green blouse and black mini skirt. Then a pair of black heels.

Ben went to the kitchen, he ate breakfast with his parents. Once done, he got in his car and head to the mall. Today he was going to shopping with his cousin Gwen, his girlfriends Julie and Kai.

15511.title: Kid/Adult

155111.content: What else are you adding?
155111.title: Nah. Let's add something else

info.brief_description: Pokèmon training humans? Little Girl Avengers? In these realities, It's Just Another Day.
info.description:
Imagine a reality where dogs train humans, a reality where both men and women embrace feminity, or a reality where everyone is an adult baby. In this story, you get to explore the day-to-day lives of your favorite fandoms such as Pokèmon, Assassin's Creed, and The Avengers flipped around in these and many other possible situations. Or if you want, you can just base this upside down world off of our own reality.

This is where most stories would lay down the ground rules, but I've got nothing. Go nuts.
